titles.title: An original resolution relative to expenditures by the Select Committee on Intelligence.

action.text: Committee on Intelligence. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Boren. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 100-169.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/30/1987--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended) Amends the Omnibus Committee Funding Resolution of 1986 to increase by $20,000 the limitation on the amount of the expenses of the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence through February 28, 1987. Amends the Omnibus Committee Funding Resolution of 1987 to increase by $36,250 the limitation on the amount of the expenses of the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence through February 29, 1988.
